column4: Hi. I get the following error when I start ubuntu.. it starts and works alright, but would like to know what this is about :[4295233.595000]  hdb: error code: 0x70  sense_key: 0x02  asc: 0x30  ascq: 0x00"
well, i have one hard disk on the laptop.. hda which is 100G and a CD/DVD writer. which also seems to work fine when i burn...
not sure really, just a stab
